description: Mobile techniques used by Tangelo, ATT&CK software S0329 v1.1
name: Tangelo (S0329)

techniques.comment: Tangelo contains functionality to gather call logs.
Tangelo accesses databases from WhatsApp, Viber, Skype, and Line. It also accesses browser history, pictures, and videos.
Tangelo contains functionality to gather SMS messages.
Tangelo contains functionality to gather GPS coordinates.
Tangelo contains functionality to record calls as well as the victim device's environment.
Tangelo contains functionality to gather cellular IDs.
